Title: Ajji
Writer: Devashish Makhija (dialogue), Devashish Makhija (screenplay), Devashish Makhija (story), Maya Tideman (additional screenplay), Mirat Trivedi (screenplay), Mirat Trivedi (story)
Actors: Sushama Deshpande, Smita Tambe, Sharvani Suryavanshi, Abhishek Banerjee
Plot: Little Manda is found raped and dumped in a trash heap near her slum. Her parents are more concerned with survival than dignity. The cops are powerless to help as the rapist is a local ...
